Nyamar Jadi Kakak Kelas, Kuli Bangunan di Pulau Tidung Cabuli Siswi SMA
05 Nov 2019, 22:18 by Jabbar Ramdhani
Jakarta - Polisi menangkap seorang kuli bangunan atas kasus pencabulan yang terjadi di Pulau Tidung, Kepulauan Seribu, Jakarta. Pelaku bernama Suprapto (26) tersebut mencabuli seorang siswi SMA yang saat itu tengah mengikuti kegiatan jurit malam.
"Tersangka merupakan pekerja bangunan proyek di Pulau Tidung. Tersangka sudah lama mengamati gerak-gerik korban. Pada hari Rabu, 23 Oktober 2019. tersangka sudah mengetahui bahwa di sekolah korban diadakan acara jurit malam," kata Kapolres Kepulauan Seribu AKBP M Sandy Hermawan dalam keterangan tertulisnya, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Peristiwa terjadi sekitar pukul 01.00 WIB. Kegiatan jurit malam dilakukan untuk menguji mental para siswa-siswi.
Saat itu, Suprapto mengamati korban dan rekannya yang sedang menyusuri jalan. Dia lalu tiba-tiba menghampiri korban dengan kondisi muka ditutupi kemeja.
"Pelaku mengaku sebagai kakak kelas korban dan menyuruh korban dan rekan korban untuk memisahkan diri berlawanan arah. Korban dan rekannya mengikuti arahan tersangka karena mengira tersangka kakak kelasnya," ujar dia.
Setelah korban berpisah cukup jauh dengan rekannya, Suprapto mengarahkan korban menuju semak-semak pinggir pantai. Sandy mengatakan korban sempat curiga dan bertanya soal tujuan mengarahkan ke semak-semak.
"Tidak lama kemudian, korban langsung dibekap mulutnya oleh tersangka dengan menggunakan tangan kanan, sedangkan tangan kiri tersangka meraba bagian payudara korban. Seketika korban langsung melakukan perlawanan, namun tersangka justru memaksa korban hingga korban mengalami kekerasan yang menyebabkan salah satu gigi korban lepas. Korban terus berteriak sehingga tersangka panik dan melarikan diri," ujarnya.
Polisi menangkap pelaku tujuh jam kemudian berbekal ciri-ciri yang disampaikan korban. Pelaku sempat memeriksa kakak kelas korban. Namun ternyata tak ada yang sesuai dengan petunjuk korban.
"Tapi di situ (lokasi kejadian) ada pekerja bangunan, kita periksa dan ternyata ada pelaku yang sesuai dengan petunjuk korban," ungkapnya.
Suprapto pun diringkus saat itu juga. Ia dijerat Pasal 82 juncto Pasal 76E no 35 tahun 2014 tentang perubahan atas UU no 23 tahun 2002 tentang Perlindungan Anak dan atau Pasal 289 KUHP. Ia juga diancam penjara minimal 5 tahun dan maksimal 15 tahun.

Disguised as Class Sister, Coolie Building on Tidung Cabuli Island High School Girls
05 Nov 2019, 22:18 by Jabbar Ramdhani
Jakarta - Police arrested a construction worker for a sexual abuse case that occurred on Tidung Island, Thousand Islands, Jakarta. The actor named Suprapto (26) molested a high school student who was at the time taking part in night shift activities.
"The suspect is a project construction worker on Tidung Island. The suspect has long been observing the movements of the victims. On Wednesday, October 23, 2019. the suspect already knew that at the victim's school held a night jurit event," said Thousand Islands Police Chief AKBP M Sandy Hermawan in a statement he said, Tuesday (11/5/2019).
The incident occurred at around 01.00 WIB. Night curling activities are carried out to test students' mentality.
At that time, Suprapto observed the victim and his partner who were walking down the street. He then suddenly approached the victim with his face covered with a shirt.
"The perpetrator claimed to be the victim's upperclassman and ordered the victim and his victim's colleague to separate themselves in the opposite direction. The victim and his colleague followed the suspect's directions because he thought his classmate suspect," he said.
After the victim parted ways far enough with his colleague, Suprapto directed the victim towards the beach bushes. Sandy said the victim was suspicious and asked about the purpose of directing it into the bush.
"Not long after, the victim immediately covered his mouth by the suspect using his right hand, while the suspect's left hand touched the victim's breast. Instantly the victim immediately put up a fight, but the suspect actually forced the victim until the victim experienced violence that caused one of the victim's teeth off. The victim continued shouting so the suspect panicked and ran away, "he said.
The police arrested the perpetrator seven hours later armed with the characteristics conveyed by the victim. The perpetrator briefly examined the victim's upperclassman. But apparently nothing was in accordance with the instructions of the victim.
"But there (construction site) there are construction workers, we check and it turns out there are perpetrators who are in accordance with the instructions of the victim," he said.
Suprapto was arrested right then and there. He was charged with Article 82 in conjunction with Article 76E No. 35 of 2014 concerning amendments to Law No. 23 of 2002 concerning Child Protection and or Article 289 of the Criminal Code. He was also threatened with imprisonment of at least 5 years and a maximum of 15 years.
